changes: Verified UploadJobDefinitionTOMLHandler handles missing source_type correctly
Handler flow: TOML parse -> CrawlerJobDefinitionFile.Validate() -> ToJobDefinition() -> JobDefinition.Validate() -> Save
CrawlerJobDefinitionFile has no source_type field, so it's never set during TOML upload
JobDefinition.Validate() from Step 9 now allows empty source_type
No additional source_type constraints found in handler
Handler correctly creates jobs with empty source_type
handler_behavior: UploadJobDefinitionTOMLHandler parses TOML into CrawlerJobDefinitionFile (which has no source_type field), calls crawlerJob.Validate() for TOML structure validation, converts to JobDefinition via ToJobDefinition() (which leaves source_type empty), then calls jobDef.Validate() which allows empty source_type per Step 9 changes. Handler successfully creates job definitions without source_type and returns 201 Created.
